product_name: Vans Encore Hello Kitty Snowboard Boots - Girls'
long_description: Hello, performance! Hello, comfort! Hello Kitty! The Vans Encore Hello Kitty Snowboard Boots for girls feature an adorable allover print girls will love, and the comfort they'll need on the hill. Boa(R) lacing system distributes closure force evenly for a glovelike fit; they never come untied and can be adjusted on the fly. TriFit thermal liners feature pads that hold her heels in place and wrap feet in padded comfort thanks to their open-cell foam construction; foam helps keep little feet warm. "Grow With You" footbed shims give kids more room as they grow: simply remove shims as her feet grow. Cuffs flex easily for enhanced board control when carving; wrap-around design offers a secure closure around ankles and calves. Full instep articulation allows the upper and lower zones of the boots to flex independently, creating a fluid forward motion and minimizing shell distortion. Vans Encore Hello Kitty Snowboard Boots feature outsoles with compression-molded EVA midsoles; they offer a multi-flex lug pattern for great traction when off the snowboard.
short_description: Hello, performance! Hello, comfort! Hello Kitty! The Vans Encore Hello Kitty Snowboard Boots for girls feature an adorable allover print girls will love, and the comfort they'll need on the hill.
